ARABIC: وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do not be like those who say, 'We hear,' when they do not hear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And do not be like those who say: "We have heard," but do not hear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And do not be like those who say: 'We hear', though they do not hearken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not be like those who said that they have heard (the Messenger's commands) but do not pay any attention to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And do not be like those who said, “We have heard”, whereas they do not hear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And be not like those who say: "We have heard," but they hear not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And be not like those who said, We hear, and they did not obey.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and be not as those who say, 'We hear,' and they hear not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Be not as those who say, we hear, and they hear not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not be like those who say, "We hear," but pay no heed to what they hear --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And be not like unto those who say: we hear, whereas they hearken not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do not be like those who say, ‘We hear,’ though they do not hear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor be like those who say, "We hear," but listen not:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And be not like those who say: "We have heard," but they hear not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not be like those who say: 'We hear' but they do not listen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And be not like those who say, “We hear,” when they do not hear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And do not be like those who say, "We have heard," while they do not hear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:21] And do not be as those who say, ‘We hear,’ and they hear not, in such a way as to reflect and heed admonition — these are either the hypocrites or the idolaters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Be not) in transgression; it is also said that this means: be not in obedience, (as those who say, We hear) we obey, the reference here being to the Banu 'Abd al-Dar, al-Nadr Ibn al-Harith and his host, (and they hear not) they obey not.
